name: Sister Adventure
description:
The little girl lost her sister, but she does not despair and goes in search of her, armed with a sword and full of courage, she begins her search. Dark dungeons, an abandoned castle and the lair of the nasty pig that holds her sister captive. Will she be able to overcome all the traps in her path, collect the keys to secret doors, crack down on monsters and save her beloved sister?

Sister Adventure - A platform game with elements of puzzles, overcoming various traps, collecting keys and opening chests. The game has elements of clothing and weapons that you can equip on your hero.

Game Features:
- difficulty
- traps
- Key Collecting
- Equipment System
- Inventory
- the boss
- More than 20 levels
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Responsive management
